```{r}
#read in data
localgov <- read.csv("counties_1.csv")

#load in libraries
library(data.table)
library(tigris)
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(extrafont) 
library(car)
library(multcomp)
library(factoextra)
library(psych)
library(colorspace)
```

```{r}
#subset out what variables you want to look at 
localgov_1 <- localgov[,c("Population","TotalRevenue","IRR","Mean.Income","dac_proporation")]

#makes the scatterplot matrix, so you can quickly check for multicollinearity
pairs.panels(localgov_1)
```

```{r}
#Poisson Regression 

a.glm <- glm(Budget ~ TotalRevenue)

```
